name: New Service Creation
description: Detects creation of a new service.
false_positives: Legitimate administrator or user creates a service for legitimate reasons.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\sc.exe AND process.command_line:*create* AND process.command_line:*binPath*) OR (process.command_line:*New\-Service* AND process.command_line:*\-BinaryPathName*))`
